**What's the GAD-7 questionnaire?**    

The GAD-7 is a self-reported questionnaire for screening and measuring the severity of generalized anxiety disorder (GAD). It consists of seven questions that relate to the symptoms of GAD.  

**Instruction:** You will be asked to rate how often you have been bothered by each symptom over the past two weeks on a scale from 0 (Not at all) to 3 (Nearly every day).   

After completing the questionnaire, you will receive a score and the follow-up that can help you and healthcare professionals determine if you might benefit from further evaluation or treatment for anxiety. 

Please note that this test is not a diagnostic tool. Only a qualified medical professional can diagnose anxiety disorders.  

 **Times:** 2 min  
  **Number of questions:** 7 

**Are you ready to begin the GAD-7 anxiety questionnaire?**

questions.question: Question 1: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge?
questions.description: This question aims to assess the frequency of your feelings of nervousness or anxiety.
questions.instruction: Please select the option that best fits your experience over the last 2 weeks.

questions.question: Question 2: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by not being able to stop or control worrying?
questions.description: This question is designed to evaluate your experience with uncontrollable worrying.
questions.instruction: Please select the option that best describes how often you've felt this way in the last 2 weeks.

questions.question: Question 3: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by worrying too much about different things?
questions.description: This question aims to understand the extent of your worry about various aspects of life.
questions.instruction: Please select the option that best reflects your experience with this issue over the last 2 weeks.

questions.question: Question 4: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by trouble relaxing?
questions.description: This question seeks to assess the frequency with which you've had difficulty relaxing.
questions.instruction: Please choose the option that best describes your experience during the past 2 weeks.

questions.question: Question 5: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by being so restless that it is hard to sit still?
questions.description: This question is intended to gauge how often you've felt unusually restless.
questions.instruction: Please select the option that best matches your experience in the last 2 weeks.

questions.question: Question 6: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by becoming easily annoyed or irritable?
questions.description: This question aims to determine the frequency of irritability or annoyance you may have experienced.
questions.instruction: Please select the option that best describes how often you've felt this way in the last 2 weeks.

questions.question: Question 7: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by feeling afraid as if something awful might happen?
questions.description: This question is designed to understand how often you've been troubled by fear or a sense of impending doom.
questions.instruction: Please select the option that best reflects your experience with this feeling over the last 2 weeks.
